testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDeviceInformationSubscription dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.9.8 [Need to Share Ramp Metering Schedule] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N84R365_Authentication_Supported = ${TMDD_N84R365_Authentication_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether External Center Organization is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N84R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported = ${TMDD_N84R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Content of Device Information Request Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N84R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N84R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N84R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N84R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N84R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N84R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N84R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N84R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N84R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N84R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N84R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N84R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationMessage: ${PublicationMessage}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be performed within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationCount: ${PublicationCount}
Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Identify the Organization Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OrganizationID: ${OrganizationID}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionResponseMessage: ${SubscriptionResponseMessage}

Step 22 SUBSCRIPTION-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password ORGANIZATIONID = OrganizationID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 23 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.1 IF TMDD_N84R365_Authentication_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.1.1 VERIFY that element authentication exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 23.2 IF TMDD_N84R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.2.1 VERIFY that element organization-requesting exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 23.3 IF TMDD_N84R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.3.1 VERIFY that element device-filter exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 23.4 IF TMDD_N84R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.4.1 VERIFY that element device-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 23.5 IF TMDD_N84R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.5.1 VERIFY that element network-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 23.6 IF TMDD_N84R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.6.1 VERIFY that element link-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 23.7 IF TMDD_N84R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.7.1 VERIFY that element link-designator-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 23.8 IF TMDD_N84R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.8.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 23.9 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 23.10 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True

Step 23.11 POSTCONDITION: SUBSCRIPTION-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified SUBSCRIPTIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = SubscriptionResponseMessage
Step 23.12 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 23.12.1 PUBLICATION-OC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlRampMeterControlScheduleUpdate PUBLICATIONMESSAGE = PublicationMessage PUBLICATIONCOUNT = PublicationCount PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
